summary: The _misc package offers diagnostic utilities for CuPy, including tools to examine GPU memory regions of arrays to detect overlapping or identical allocations, and a routine that generates a concise report of the CuPy runtime environment, CUDA driver version, and available GPU devices.
business_intent: Enable developers to debug memoryâ€‘related issues and verify system configuration, ensuring correct usage of GPU resources and facilitating troubleshooting of performance or compatibility problems in CuPy applications.
